alert.note: Alert for Coastal Bay; Inland Bay; South Walton; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 10 at 2:15PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Bay, southern Walton and southwestern Washington Counties through 245 PM EDT/145 PM CDT/... At 215 PM EDT/115 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles east of Destin to near Santa Rosa Beach to 13 miles northwest of Panama City Beach. Movement was north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Santa Rosa Beach, Eglin Air Force Base, Live Oak, Freeport, Ebro, Portland, Villa Tasso, Seminole Hills, Blue Mountain Beach, Seaside, Holmes Valley, Millers Ferry, Gulf Pines, Bunker, Grayton Beach, Sandestin, Four Mile Village, Red Bay, Inlet Beach and Port Washington. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Bay; Inland Bay; South Walton; Washington
